title: Bloom and Grow Radio with Maria Failla
description:
Joe is joined again by the amazingly talented plant enthusiast Maria Failla of Bloom and Grow Radio. They chat about Maria's new book before Joe shares an interesting (but unfortunate) story about sap licking!

Click this link to check out Maria's new book https://bloomandgrowradio.com/book
And heres a special link with a free 3 day trial to Maria's Virtual Garden Society exclusively for Social Studies listeners: linked here!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
